text:
Morgan Neville (born October 10, 1967) is an American movie producer, director and writer.
His best known movies were "20 Feet from Stardom", which won him the Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature in 2014 as well as a Grammy Award for Best Music Film, and "Won't You Be My Neighbor?", a documentary about Fred Rogers, in June 2018, got critical acclaim and became the highest grossing biographical-documentary of all time.
